teaser: A discussion of highlights from the week's news.
description: A discussion of highlights from the week's news.
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

Joining Kai to talk about the week's business and economic news are Nela Richardson from Redfin and Sudeep Reddy  from the Wall Street Journal. The big topics this week: General Electric's plans to sell off most of GE Capital, the company's financial division, and the reasons behind some countries' current stock market highs.  

"},{"content":"

title: Weekly Wrap: General Electric and stock market highs
contentencoded: Joining Kai to talk about the week's business and economic news are Nela Richardson from Redfin and Sudeep Reddy  from the Wall Street Journal. The big topics this week: General Electric's plans to sell off most of GE Capital, the company's financial division, and the reasons behind some countries' current stock market highs.
